sentences.sentence: The lichen identification was based on color data.
sentences.translation: 这个地衣测试是基于颜色数据的。

sentences.sentence: One of the smallest is the Lichen plant which grows on stones.
sentences.translation: 世界上最小的植物之一叫做地衣，它只生长在石头上。

sentences.sentence: Lichen eats away at granite and over time can cause cracks and pockmarks.
sentences.translation: 苔藓会侵蚀花岗岩，而且随着时间的推移，这些苔藓会使岩石产生裂缝和凹痕。
